message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I appreciate you being willing to negotiate.  However, I'm looking to spend a bit less.  Would you be willing to take $105 for the product?  Let me know what you think!
Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $115.
